HEALTH EQUITY & DISPARITIES
IN A 21st CENTURY PANDEMIC
Single spaced, one-inch margins, 12-point, Calibri font

All abstracts will be reviewed by the Editors to ensure fit to scope in addressing one or more of the identified topics or a topic as discussed with an Editor, analytical rigor and adherence to the style guidelines.
Authors of accepted abstracts are expected to present their abstract during a Symposium session for peer review and discussion.
Single spaced, one-inch margins, 12-point, Calibri font
Each chapter submission will be peer reviewed
Decisions will be communicated to authors on December 1, 2021
Reference Style Guide: The Chicago Manual of Style Online: Please use the Chicago Manual of Style for in-text citation and reference format.

Guidance on Race-Related Coverage: AP Stylebook: Please refer to the AP Stylebook’s, Race Related Coverage statement which provides additional guidance to support efforts to “accurately represent the world, or a particular community, and its diversity through the people you quote and depict in all formats. Omissions and lack of inclusion can render people invisible and cause anguish.”
